nodes.description: 奥斯陆政府总部附近发生大规模炸弹袭击
nodes.support_text: A huge bomb has caused large-scale devastation close to government headquarters

nodes.description: 奥斯陆郊外劳工党青年营地发生枪击案致10人死亡
nodes.support_text: At least 10 people are killed in a shooting at a Labour Party youth camp outside Oslo

nodes.description: 32岁挪威籍嫌疑人被逮捕，涉嫌策划两起袭击
nodes.support_text: A 32-year-old Norwegian has been arrested and is thought to be behind both attacks

nodes.description: 首相延斯·斯托尔滕贝格表示不会因恐袭屈服
nodes.support_text: PM Jens Stoltenberg says: 'No-one will bomb us to silence'

edges.support_text: close to government headquarters in Oslo Norwegian police say at least seven people have been killed and two are badly wounded
A 32-year-old Norwegian has been arrested and is thought to be behind both attacks
PM Jens Stoltenberg says: 'No-one will bomb us to silence'
